TopicTitle: Mod idea: Improved artificial gravity support

Articles.Content:
So I remember around three years ago a lot of kerbanauts were building "artificial gravity" stations using centripetal force and at keosynchronous orbit you could drive rovers around the inertia ring...

I've done all this but as someone who loves interiors I'm wondering if someone can't make a mod making it possible for the kerbals to stand up straight on any surface they feel gravity toward so that I can finally reenact my 2001 space Odyssey dreams.

I have next to little modding experience and have no idea where someone would even begin to implement this but I thought I would through my thoughts out to anyone that does.
Take a look at MagneticEVA - Magnetic boots for your Kerbals!
